desc: Infinity Vans Ramble Kit for the 144 Sprinter and the Haven Kit for the 170 Sprinter. Our kits are built off of our two layer panel base kit for a quick, strong, safe and lightweight build. Our base kit can be installed in a weekend. Learn to install it at one of our free installer trainings.

layout.text: A VAN KIT THAT MAKES VAN BUILDS FUN!
Everything You Need for the Perfect Van Build
